name: Battle Royale Tycoon (itch)
description:
A mash up of the Battle Royale & Tycoon Genres made for Ludum Dare 41.

Battle Royale Tycoon is a tycoon game around running a battle royale arena. Every 4 minutes 25 AI are dropped into the arena and fight to the death. The player then uses the money from the battles to build up the arena, replace weapons used & clean up corpses.

Vote on it here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/battle-royale-tycoon
